channel.title: [PI] Slayer Points Shop
channel.description: I have been trying to find a tutorial on how to make a Slayer Points shop and add items to it, but I couldnt find one i looked on here for it and other rsps sites and couldnt find one, so can anyone help me at all?

item.title: [PI] Slayer Points Shop
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

Not hard.

Go to playerSave.java and find:

characterfile.write("character-rights = ", 0, 19); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.playerRights), 0, Integer.toString(p.playerRights).length()); characterfile.newLine();
Under that, add:

characterfile.write("slay-points = ", 0, 12); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.slayPoints), 0, Integer.toString(p.slayPoints).length()); characterfile.newLine();
Find:

} else if (token.equals("character-rights")) { p.playerRights = Integer.parseInt(token2);
Under that, add:

} else if (token.equals("slay-points")) { p.slayPoints = Integer.parseInt(token2);
Save and Close.

Open Player.java and find:

Under that, add:

Close and Save.

Open Shops.cfg and add:

Save and Close.

Open ActionHandler.java and find:

Under

Add:

case NPCID: c.getShops().openShop(99); break;

Save and Close.

Open up ShopAssistant.java and find:

Under

Add:

if (c.myShopId == 99) { c.sendMessage(c.getItems().getItemName(removeId)+": currently costs " + getSpecialItemValue(removeId) + " Slayer Points."); return; }
Still in ShopAssistant, find:

Under

Add

if (c.myShopId == 73) { handleOtherShop(itemID); return false; }
Still in ShopAssistant, find

Under it, add:

[code] if (c.myShopId == 99) {
if (c.slayPoints >= getSpecialItemValue(itemID)) {
if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0){
c.pkPoints -= getSpecialItemValue(itemID);
c.getItems().addItem(itemID,1);
c.getItems().resetItems(3823);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You do not have enough slayer points to buy this item.”);
}

		}[/code]

Save and Close.

Open NpcHandler.java and find:

Under

Add:

Under

Add:

Under

Add:

Post any errors and I’ll be glad to help.

Read full topic
